comments:
When invoking Free Up Memory... action on a selected object, dialog prompts user
to save all unsaved resource. However, even if all of the items in the unsaved
list is selected, only the selected resource in profile monitor view is saved,
and everything else is ignored.
bug 101937 opened for readme in TPTP 4.0
Ali, I will work on this

The save works now, but then the profiling monitor view is not auto refresh
after the save is finished, if user select some resource not to save when
prompted. The following exception might result. The workaround is manually
refresh workspace with file system and things run fine.
